duties_responsibilities.duty: Assessing and implementing strategic planning and execution to improve organizational operations and drive change.
Planning and executing large projects, including the management of events or workshops within the public sector.
Crafting and delivering compelling narratives that influence actions on key business decisions and major change initiatives.
Applying frameworks aligned with strategy to transform efforts in the public sector.
Developing presentations and work products using PowerPoint and Excel.
Assessing how alterations will impact business processes and designing holistic views of organizations to transform practices for the better.
Utilizing data analysis and visualization skills using Excel, Tableau, or PowerBI.
Utilizing facilitation skills and change management expertise to guide organizational transformation.
